query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZPST0026 SET ZTXT01 = #ZTXT01# , ZTXT02 = #ZTXT02# , ZTXT03 = #ZTXT03# , ZTXT04 = #ZTXT04# , ZTXT05 = #ZTXT05# , ZTXT06 = #ZTXT06# , ZTXT07 = #ZTXT07# , ZTXT08 = #ZTXT08# , ZTXT09 = #ZTXT09# , ZTXT10 = #ZTXT10# , ZTXT11 = #ZTXT11# , ZTXT12 = #ZTXT12# WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CDATE = #CDATE# AND LIFNR = #LIFNR#
